page_title_en: GameSpot Sweepstakes In collaboration with StockX
page_description_en: Enter now for your chance to win a PS5, an extra controller, a headset, and God of War Ragnarok.
page_text_html:
Fans of the coolest clothing, hottest technology, and limited-edition collectibles, gather round and get ready to enter the Fully Stocked sweepstakes! GameSpot is running a sweepstakes in collaboration with StockX, and the prize is a PlayStation 5 console, an extra controller, a wireless Pulse 3D headset, and a copy of God of War Ragnarok.

Ever since it launched in late 2020, the PS5 has been one of the most desirable gaming consoles on the market. Supply hasn't been able to keep up with demand, as the PS5's combination of cutting-edge technology, next-generation DualSense controller, and a library of the biggest games on the market has regularly seen it sell out in record time. With the epic action-adventure God of War Ragnarok generating huge levels of excitement, this holiday season is shaping up to be a blockbuster for PlayStation gamers so you'll want to have a console in your home.

For your chance to win the PS5 bundle, all you have to do is enter your details in the form below. The competition closes on Monday December 9, and winners will be drawn shortly after the deadline. That lucky winner will be contacted by phone or email and will receive one of the hottest gaming bundles of the year.

Even if your name isn't drawn, StockX can help you get your hands on a prized PS5 console. StockX is the marketplace for customers who have their finger on the pulse of culture and current trends, a hub for collectors that allows them to safely purchase the products that they want and rest assured that they'll be receiving a StockX Verified item from a passionate community of like-minded collectors. In a digital frontier where true supply meets real demand, StockX brings fans of video game consoles, stylish clothing, and other collectibles together.

This is a marketplace where the prices are defined by fans and reflect the true value of hard-to-find goods. With StockX, you can access them now.

  • Xbox Mini Fridge
  • PS5 Horizon Forbidden West Bundle
  • Nvidia GeForce RTX 4090
  • Nintendo Switch OLED

Please note that GameSpot is solely responsible for facilitating, managing and executing the sweepstakes and entry is open only to US residents over the age of 18
